{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.24068v1", "title": "A Quantum Energy Inequality for a Non-commutative QFT", "summary": "We establish a quantum energy inequality (QEI) for a quantum field theory
formulated in a non-commutative spacetime. This inequality provides a
fundamental bound on the expectation values of the energy density, ensuring the
stability and physical consistency of the theory.", "main_category": "hep-th", "categories": "hep-th,math-ph,math.MP", "published": "2025-03-31T13:27:12Z"}
